content: I’m curious; this system almost makes it seem like goals and objectives shouldn’t be completed. Is there any kind of “follow-up” to OKRs, that ensures 100% is eventually reached? Should the OKR carry over to the next quarter with a goal of completing it to 100%, or does it just drop out of the goals once you hit that sweet spot, you set new OKRs and the other 20–30% gets completed “whenever”?
